title: Eiffel Tower
snippet: The Eiffel Tower is located in Paris, France. It was built in 1889 and is one of the most famous landmarks in the world.

title: Louvre Museum
snippet: The Louvre Museum in Paris houses thousands of works of art, including the Mona Lisa. It is the world's largest art museum.

title: Table Mountain
snippet: Table Mountain in Cape Town,  it is a significant tourist attraction, with many visitors using the cableway or hiking to the top
